text.section: There is an Aquaculture Review Board.

section.section: The National Marine Fisheries Service shall be invited to designate a representative to the Review Board.
The United States Army Corps of Engineers shall be invited to designate a representative to the Review Board.
The Aquaculture Coordinator shall be the single point of contact for an applicant for all permits and licenses necessary to conduct aquaculture in the State.

The Review Board shall:
Coordinate the development of statewide aquaculture policy and, to the maximum extent feasible, the streamlining of the application process;
Track each application as it is processed; and
Ensure full and meaningful departmental communication with an applicant during each stage of the application process.
